Welcome to the State Capitals Quiz!

The State Capitals Quiz tests your knowledge of capital cities across the United States. The quiz consists of 6 questions, each asking you to identify the capital city of a given state.

Navigating the Quiz

By clicking "Start Quiz" in the navigation bar, you will start the quiz. To move to the next question, simply swipe left. Once you have answered all 6 questions, the app will display your quiz results immediately following the final question.

Viewing Past Results

By clicking "View Results" in the navigation bar, you can access your prior quizzes.

Good luck, and enjoy testing your knowledge of U.S. state capitals!
